SELECT board_no, board_id, board_content, userid, board_title, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as board_date,board_count,board_recomm FROM boardtable
where board_id in('videoLOL','videoFun','videoEtc')
and board_title like '%' || #{board_title} || '%'
order by board_no desc, board_date desc limit 0,12;

select board_no, board_id, board_content, userid, board_title, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as board_date,board_count,board_recomm from boardtable where board_no <= #{board_no} and board_no > #{board_no}-13 order by board_no desc, board_date desc limit 0,12;
select * from boardtable where board_id in('videoLOL','videoFun','videoEtc') order by board_count desc,board_recomm desc limit 0, 5;
